languages.text: {n}Проповедник. Человек, что несет идею и возглашает ее... Кто это, Немезит? Или кто-то из его сторонников? Уже убитых здесь или еще живых? Расклад неясен, и я тяну четвертую карту — опасно алкать слишком многого от Неумирающего, но я должна знать!{/n}

{n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Проповедник. Человек, что несет идею и возглашает ее... Кто это, Немезит? Или кто-то из его сторонников? Уже убитых здесь или еще живых? Расклад неясен, и я тяну четвертую карту — опасно алкать слишком многого от Неумирающего, но я должна знать!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Preacher. A man who bears an idea and proclaims it... Who is it, Nemesite? Or one of his supporters? Someone who has already been slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask too much of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

{n}Preacher. A man who bears an idea and proclaims it... Who is it, Nemesite? Or one of his supporters? Someone who has already been slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask too much of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

{n}Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask too much of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

{n}Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask too much of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

{n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

{n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Prediger. Ein Mann, der eine Idee hat und sie verkündet ... Aber wer ist es? Nemesit? Einer seiner Unterstützer? Jemand, der schon erschlagen wurde, oder jemand, der noch lebt? Die Prophetie ist unklar, also ziehe ich eine vierte Karte. Es ist gefährlich, den Todlosen mehr zu fragen, aber ich muss es wissen!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Prediger. Ein Mann, der eine Idee hat und sie verkündet ... Aber wer ist es? Nemesit? Einer seiner Unterstützer? Jemand, der schon erschlagen wurde, oder jemand, der noch lebt? Die Prophetie ist unklar, also ziehe ich eine vierte Karte. Es ist gefährlich, den Todlosen mehr zu fragen, aber ich muss es wissen!{/n}

languages.text: {n}El predicador. Un hombre que porta una idea y la proclama... pero ¿de quién se trata? ¿Nemesitio? ¿Uno de sus seguidores? ¿Alguien ya muerto o aún vivo? La adivinación no es clara, de modo que revelo una cuarta carta. Es peligroso pedirle más al Inmortal, pero ¡debo saberlo!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El predicador. Un hombre que porta una idea y la proclama... pero ¿de quién se trata? ¿Nemesitio? ¿Uno de sus seguidores? ¿Alguien ya muerto o aún vivo? La adivinación no es clara, de modo que revelo una cuarta carta. Es peligroso pedirle más al Inmortal, pero ¡debo saberlo!{/n}

languages.text: {n}プリーチャーだ。考えを持って、それを宣言する男…でも、誰のことだろう？ネメサイト？それとも彼の後ろ盾の誰か？すでに死んでいるのか、まだ生きているのか…？ディビネーションがハッキリしなくて、4枚目のカードを引いた。これ以上、不死の者に尋ねるのは危険だけど、どうしても知りたい！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}プリーチャーだ。考えを持って、それを宣言する男…でも、誰のことだろう？ネメサイト？それとも彼の後ろ盾の誰か？すでに死んでいるのか、まだ生きているのか…？ディビネーションがハッキリしなくて、4枚目のカードを引いた。これ以上、不死の者に尋ねるのは危険だけど、どうしても知りたい！{/n}

languages.text: {n}正位布道士，负责散播意识形态的人……但这个人是谁？是涅墨斯特吗？还是他的某个支持者？是活人，还是死人？占卜并没有预示足够的真相，于是我抽出了第四张牌。向不死之神索求更多恩赐是危险的行为，但我必须得知真相！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}正位布道士，负责散播意识形态的人……但这个人是谁？是涅墨斯特吗？还是他的某个支持者？是活人，还是死人？占卜并没有预示足够的真相，于是我抽出了第四张牌。向不死之神索求更多恩赐是危险的行为，但我必须得知真相！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le Prêcheur. Un homme porteur d'une idée et qui la proclame... Mais qui est-il ? Némésite ? L'un de ses partisans ? Est-il déjà mort ou encore en vie ? L'augure n'est pas clair, je dois donc tirer une quatrième carte. Il est dangereux d'en demander plus à l'Immortel, mais je dois savoir !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Prédicateur. Un homme porteur d'une idée et qui la proclame... Mais qui est-il ? Némésite ? L'un de ses partisans ? Est-il déjà mort ou encore en vie ? L'augure n'est pas clair, je dois donc tirer une quatrième carte. Il est dangereux d'en demander plus à l'Immortel, mais je dois savoir !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vaiz. Bir fikri olan ve bu fikri yere göğe sığdıramayan bir adam... Peki kim bu? Nemezit mi? Onun destekçilerinden biri mi? Çoktan nihayete ermiş biri mi yoksa hâlâ yaşayanlar arasında mı? Kehanet açık değil. Dördüncü kartı çekiyorum. Ölmeyen'den daha fazlasını istemek tehlikeli olsa da bilmem gerekiyor!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Preacher. A man who carries an idea and proclaims it... But who is it? Nemesite? One of his supporters? Someone already slain or someone still alive? The divination is unclear, and so I draw a fourth card. It is dangerous to ask more of the Undying One, but I must know!{/n}
